document_data.name: Thinking cap
document_data.mainbody: '''Thinking caps''' were a species of giant [[fungi]] that grew underground.
document_data.Description: These fungi were not toxic to ingest, though they had a taste reminiscent of [[chlorine]].

Ecology.Habitats: One of the known locations of these fungi was beneath the [[Misty Forest]].
Ecology.Usages: If removed carefully, the caps of these mushrooms could be used as makeshift [[raft]]s.
